examples: This is the description of my repository

version.description: Current version of your module. Must follow semver.

bump.description: Increment the version by release type. See https://docs.nest.land/eggs/configuration.html#field-information.

entry.description: The index file of your project. This is what users will see when they try to import your module from our registry! Defaults to ./mod.ts.

unstable.description: Is this version unstable?. Default value is determined by Semantic Versioning rules.

unlisted.description: Should people be able to find this module/version on the gallery?. Defaults to false.

repository.description: A link to your repository. Defaults to null.

files.description: All the files that should be uploaded to nest.land. Supports file globbing. Do not use ./**/* for the files field! This has been known to cause errors in the publishing process.

ignore.description: All the files that should be ignored when uploading to nest.land. Supports file globbing.

checkFormat.description: Automatically format your code before publishing to the blockchain. Defaults to false

checkTests.description: Run deno test. Defaults to false.

checkInstallation.description: Simulates a dummy installation and check for missing files in the dependency tree. Defaults to false.

checkAll.description: Performs all checks. Defaults to true.
